about_the_game: This 3D model resource pack contains 3D monster models and motions used in a sample game of RPG Developer Bakin. There are 14 models in total.
detailed_description: This 3D model resource pack contains 3D monster models and motions used in a sample game of RPG Developer Bakin. There are 14 models in total.
name: RPG Developer Bakin 3D Monster Pack Vol.1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: This 3D model resource pack contains 3D monster models and motions used in a sample game of RPG Developer Bakin. There are 14 models in total.
